title: 20% of the incentive FSI can be used for non-residential purposes otherwise permissible as per the DCPR
clause_text: 20% of the incentive FSI can be used for non-residential purposes otherwise permissible as per the DCPR.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
